title: Naturally Stealthy
content:
Naturally Stealthy Effect Your nimble nature makes you skilled at concealment. You have advantage on Stealth checks. Requirements Lightfoot Halfling Lvl 1

Naturally Stealthy

Your nimble nature makes you skilled at concealment. You have advantage on Stealth checks.

Lightfoot Halfling Lvl 1

Naturally Stealthy is a Trait in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
